channel.title: Sugar on Being Human
channel.description: Recent content in Sugar on Being Human

item.title: How I ran into real-life brain-hacking
item.description: I have been struggling with sugar addiction for years. It took its toll on both my physical and mental health long before I even knew I had it and I have been fighting it ever since I recognized its ugly face. And just like it tends to be with addictions, it was a very tough battle, and I wasn’t always winning. I was ready to fight for the rest of my life, but now I think I might not have to.
